Name: Rotatex
About the game: Rotatex is a sloth cat. Rotatex does not like to move independently, but due to the perfect natural round shape and strong bones can easily roll. You have to turn the room and send the cat nicknamed Rotatex. Features: Manage the room, but not the cat. Convenient control of the arrows up, down or left, right.
